attributes.action: Banks and Building Societies must pass on Bank of England interest cuts by law to help middle England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks and Building Societies must by law pass on any interest cuts by the bank of England in full to support the proposed injection into the enconomy and not keep lining there own pockets.

rejection.details:
There are several petition already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/UnpatrioticBanks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
